titleStmt.title: Remarks upon the tryals of Edward Fitzharris, Stephen Colledge, Count Coningsmark, the Lord Russel, Collonel Sidney, Henry Cornish, and Charles Bateman as also on the Earl of Shaftsbury's grand jury, Wilmore's Homine replegiando, and the award of execution against Sir Thomas Armstrong / by John Hawles.
titleStmt.author: Hawles, John, Sir, 1645-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
